import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Navigation from '../components/Navigation'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import ProjectCard from '../components/ProjectCard'; const Projects = () => { const [expandedSections, setExpandedSections] = useState({}); const toggleExpand = (section) => { setExpandedSections(prev => ({ ...prev, [section]: !prev[section] })); }; const projectData = [ { image: '/image/portfolio/eed.png', alt: 'Rebuilding MSMEs After Conflict', partners: 'Partners: Ethiopian Enterprise Development (EED)', title: 'Rebuilding MSMEs After Conflict', location: 'Tigray and Amhara regions, Ethiopia', description: 'The EED project trained over 1,200 entrepreneurs and experts in Tigray and Amhara to revitalize conflict-affected MSMEs through leadership and entrepreneurial mindset training.', readMore: true, readMoreKey: 'rehab-more', extraContent: (

Read More

This initiative empowered 230 micro and small enterprises (MSEs) devastated by war, equipping owners and local trade experts with critical skills to rebuild their businesses. The training focused on:

  • Resilient leadership: Helping entrepreneurs recover and adapt in post-conflict economies.
  • Business revival strategies: Enabling MSMEs to restart operations, access markets, and sustain livelihoods.
  • Community impact: Strengthening local economies and fostering long-term stability in Tigray and Amhara.
), }, { image: '/image/portfolio/wash.png', alt: 'Addis Ababa Job Creation Bureau', partners: 'Public Sector Training\nAddis Ababa Job Creation and Enterprise Development Bureau', title: 'Transformational Leadership Training for Job Creation & MSME Growth', location: 'Addis Ababa (11 sub-cities), with workshops held in Adama & Debre Zeit', description: 'Trained 155 high-level experts and 11 sub-city sector heads on Transformational Enterprise Leadership and Entrepreneurial Mindset to strengthen Ethiopia’s job creation and enterprise transition goals.', readMore: true, readMoreKey: 'capacity-more', extraContent: (
  • Government Collaboration: Customized training modules and toolkits were developed by Biruhminds to enhance public experts’ capacity in delivering business advisory and coaching services for MSMEs.
  • Scale & Impact: Workshops equipped leaders with strategies to drive inclusive job creation and support MSMEs in transitioning to sustainable growth.
  • Localized Approach: Sessions held in Adama & Debre Zeit ensured practical, context-relevant solutions for Ethiopia’s entrepreneurial ecosystem.
), }, // ...add more projects here following the same pattern... ]; return ( <> {/* Hero Video Section */}
{ e.target.onerror = null; e.target.src = '/image/Biruhminds_logo.png'; }} />

{/* End note for research and evaluations */}
Research & Evaluation

End Note for Research and Evaluations

The engagement in various evaluation programs demonstrates our dedication to ensuring the highest standards in research practices. Here research meets purpose, delivering evidence-driven solutions for societal progress and organizational excellence.

Adherence to national laws, international declarations, and the National Research Ethics Review guideline ensures that research at Biruhminds is conducted with the highest ethical standards, particularly in studies involving human subjects or participants.
